quote_first: When he heard the faint clunk of a steel gate closing behind them, he smiled in the darkness. They were out. He pressed a button on the watch and when the light showed him it was
quote_last: his smile became a grin. No one had made it out of Greenacres for over a decade, which made Bishopâ€™s achievement that much sweeter. That was the kind of record he liked to beat.
title: The Wrong Man
author: Jason Dean
